Design-01.Description: Design Style 01: is a Solid graphic. Custom Text or Custom Logo (red 'CUSTOM TEXT / LOGO' in image) can be added and either cut out of the main stripe allowing the vehicle surface to show through, or it can be an alternate color than the main decal.

Design-02.Description: Design Style 02: is a Solid stripe with outer accent pinstripe. The outer accent (red in image) can be the same color as the main center graphic, or a different color to the main graphic. Custom Text or Custom Logo (blue 'CUSTOM TEXT / LOGO' in image) can be added and either cut out of the main stripe, it can be the same color as the accent, or an alternate color entirely.

Design-03.Description: Design Style 03: is a Solid stripe with inner accent stripe. The inner accent (red in image) can be the same color as the main center graphic, or a different color to the main graphic. Custom Text or Custom Logo (blue 'CUSTOM TEXT / LOGO' in image) can be added and either cut out of the main stripe, can be the same color as the accent, or an alternate color totally.

Design-04.Description: Design Style 04: is a strobe graphic decal with stripes starting thick at the tip of the hood, and getting thinner back toward the windshield.
